course_description: Practice and study of factors that increase the interest of a sermon as it is preached. The class emphasizes word as sound and sensitivity of the preacher to the involvement of the body and feelings in sermon delivery.
schedule_location: MF 8:30am-5pm in Candler School of Theology 248
sections: Class Nbr: 5401, Section #: 100, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MF 8:30a-5p, Instructor: T. Elliott, Status: Open
